trends: There has been one other sighting in Derby
There were no other sightings in Derby on or around May 11th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailscaught it out of the corner of my eye. It fly from west to east. I say it for only perhaps ten seconds. It was on a decending curve as perhaps a meteriote (sp) would be on. I went to work and a guy there told me he had seen it as well. I never believed in this before but it was certainly weird. I want to know why this was not no the news.
Summary: large,approx. sixe of a full size cargo van, bright almost neon green , an orb, with a tail about eignt times the diameter of the shere.
